document_data.name: Alither
document_data.mainbody:
'''Alither''' was a [[bard]], sage, and member of the [[Harpers]] from the city of [[Lyrabar]] in [[Impiltur]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite polyhedron/88/The Everwinking Eye: Treasures of the Vast, Part One|13}}
{{quote|Two roads taken to the same gate; one seen more often, the other never late.|Alither on the western and eastern branches of the Harpers}}
document_data.Activities: Among his works, Alither studied the legends of [[Adhe Wood]] in [[the Vast]] and believed that the many mutant spiders there were produced by a diseased or magically altered [[deepspawn]] dwelling there, dubbed "the [[Father of Spiders]]" by [[1370 DR]].
